use_case: 24/7 live video pre-qualification agent that books emergency calls and upsells maintenance plans
pain_point: 70% of after-hours calls go to voicemail → lost revenue

use_case: Video avatar that diagnoses leak vs. clog vs. water-heater and books correct tech
